info.name: ðŸššðŸ£StockMaster API
info.description: API RESTful para la gestion avanzada de inventarios multialmacen

exec: // Executes before each request if token is empty
console.log('Auto-login successful: Token saved to adminAccessToken');
console.error('Failed to parse login response:', parseError);
// Check if we need to login

request.description: Login with email and password. Returns access token for authentication.
Login as Worker user. Has permissions for 'record movements' and 'view inventory'.
Login as Viewer user. Has permission only for 'view inventory'.
Register a new user. Returns access token for authentication.

response.name: Validation Error - Weak Password
response.body: {"message": "Validation failed", "errors": {"password": ["The password must be at least 8 characters, contain at least one uppercase letter and one special character."]}}

request.description: Get the currently authenticated user profile
Retrieve a paginated list of products. Requires authentication.
Create a new product. Requires Admin role.
Retrieve a specific product by ID. Requires authentication.
Update a product. Requires Admin role.
Delete a product. Requires Admin role. Returns 204 No Content.
Retrieve a paginated list of categories. Requires authentication (all roles).
Create a new category. Requires Admin role. Slug is auto-generated from name.
Retrieve a specific category by ID. Requires authentication (all roles).
Update a category. Requires Admin role. Slug is auto-regenerated if name changes.
Delete a category. Requires Admin role. Returns 204 No Content.

response.name: Cannot Delete - Has Products
response.body: {"message":"Cannot delete category because it has associated products. Please remove or reassign the products first.","errors":{"category":["This category has 4 associated product(s)."]}}

request.description: Retrieve a list of all warehouses. Requires authentication (all roles).
Retrieve a list of all warehouses including their capacity metrics. Requires authentication (all roles).
Retrieve a list of all warehouses including their inventory count. Requires authentication (all roles).
Create a new warehouse. Requires Admin role. Slug is auto-generated from name.

response.name: Warehouse Created
response.body: {"message":"The Warehouse 'Distribution Center West' has been created successfully","data":{"id":4,"name":"Distribution Center West","slug":"distribution-center-west","location":"Los Angeles, USA","capacity":15000,"created_at":"2026-02-15T12:00:00.000000Z","updated_at":"2026-02-15T12:00:00.000000Z","inventories_count":0}}

request.description: Retrieve a specific warehouse by ID. Requires authentication (all roles).
Retrieve a specific warehouse by its slug. Requires authentication (all roles).
Get capacity information for a specific warehouse including utilization percentage. Requires authentication (all roles).
Update a warehouse. Requires Admin role. Slug is auto-regenerated if name changes.

response.name: Warehouse Updated
response.body: {"message":"The Warehouse 'Main Warehouse Updated' has been updated successfully","data":{"id":1,"name":"Main Warehouse Updated","slug":"main-warehouse-updated","location":"New York City, USA","capacity":12000,"created_at":"2026-01-01T00:00:00.000000Z","updated_at":"2026-02-15T12:00:00.000000Z","inventories_count":25}}

request.description: Delete a warehouse. Requires Admin role. Returns 200 with success message.

response.name: Cannot Delete - Has Inventories
response.body: {"message":"Cannot delete warehouse because it has associated inventories. Please remove or transfer the inventory first.","errors":{"warehouse":["This warehouse has 25 associated inventory record(s)."]}}

request.description: Transfer stock from one warehouse to another. Creates OUT movement in source warehouse and IN movement in destination warehouse. Requires Admin or Worker role.

response.name: Transfer Success
response.body: {"message":"Stock transferred successfully","data":{"product":{"id":1,"name":"Laptop Dell XPS 15","sku":"LAP-DELL-XPS15"},"source_warehouse":{"id":1,"name":"Main Warehouse","slug":"main-warehouse"},"destination_warehouse":{"id":2,"name":"Distribution Center","slug":"distribution-center"},"quantity":50,"movements":{"out":{"id":101,"type":"out","quantity":50,"description":"Transfer to Distribution Center: Routine stock transfer","created_at":"2026-02-18T12:00:00.000Z"},"in":{"id":102,"type":"in","quantity":50,"description":"Transfer from Main Warehouse: Routine stock transfer","created_at":"2026-02-18T12:00:00.000Z"}}}}

response.name: Source Warehouse Inactive
response.body: {"message":"The selected source warehouse is not active.","errors":{"source_warehouse_id":["The selected source warehouse is not active."]}}

response.name: Destination Warehouse Inactive
response.body: {"message":"The selected destination warehouse is not active.","errors":{"destination_warehouse_id":["The selected destination warehouse is not active."]}}
